Appoint.origin: [ ed to the agency's top post]

1.definition: to name officially to a position [to the agency's top post] [conservator of the estate]

2.definition: to determine the distribution of (property) by exercising the authority granted by a power of appointment [a general power to the corpus of a trust "W. M. McGovern, Jr."]to exercise a power of appointment see also
